## Overview

Git is a version control system that tracks changes to your files over time. This tutorial covers the core Git workflow: initializing a repository, staging changes, committing snapshots, and reviewing history.

**Prerequisites:** [Shell configuration](03-shell-configuration.qmd)
**Estimated time:** 30 minutes
